original_text: But you, my friends, come here! Try again to help me, all of you! I will not find a wise man among you. But you, my friends, come here! Try again to help me, all of you! I will not find a wise man among you. But you, my friends, come here!
korean_text: 너희는 모두 다시 올지니라 내가 너희 중에서 지혜자를 찾을 수 없느니라

sentences.original_text: But you, my friends, come here!
Try again to help me, all of you!
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 모두 다시 나를 도와 보아라!

sentences.original_text: I will not find a wise man among you.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희 중에서 지혜로운 사람을 찾지 못할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: But you, my friends, come here!
Try again to help me, all of you!
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 모두 다시 나를 도와 보아라!

sentences.original_text: I will not find a wise man among you.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희 중에서 지혜로운 사람을 찾지 못할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: But you, my friends, come here!
